ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Site Preparation
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Clear the site, set up temporary site facilities, and secure the area.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Ensure the site is cleared according to local regulations.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Foundation
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Excavate for foundation, set up formwork, lay rebar and pour concrete.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Ensure all footings and foundation elements meet structural specifications.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Wall Construction
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Build internal and external brick walls including cement block construction for external walls.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Ensure walls are level and plumb; joints and mortar meet the specified strength.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Roof & Framing
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Install timber frame for roof and other necessary supports.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Check all wooden elements are safely installed and treated for weather and insects.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Installations of plumbing, electrical systems, and heating according to codes.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Ensure all installations meet local building codes. Test all systems.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Interior Finishing
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Install drywall, ceiling treatments, floor and wall finishes in all rooms.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: Inspect finishes for quality and completeness.

ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Name: Fixture Installation
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.Description: Install lighting fixtures, cabinets, door handles and other fittings.
ConstructionTaskBreakdown.QualityControlRequirements: All fixtures to be securely fixed and fully operational.
